content.question: In paragraph 3, sentence 8 (“She used . . . for chicken”), the author’s discussion of her mother’s cooking methods serves primarily to

choices.label: help explain what made a particular meal distinctive
suggest that her mother was unwilling to try new techniques
highlight a way in which cooking has changed since the author’s childhood
offer an example of a traditional method for reducing cooking time

content.answer: help explain what made a particular meal distinctive

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
